title: ‘I Want to Get out of My Comfort Zone:’ Wout van Aert Rolls Dice in All-or-Nothing Cobblestone Quest
content:
Van Aert shuns Italian classics in hunt for glory at Flanders, Roubaix; backs Visma's classics core as 'even stronger' in 2024.

Read the full article at ‘I Want to Get out of My Comfort Zone:’ Wout van Aert Rolls Dice in All-or-Nothing Cobblestone Quest on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
